db:select.doc:name: Check existence in Database
db:select.db:parameterized-query: SELECT first_name,last_name,email FROM contact WHERE email=#[payload.email]

db:insert.doc:name: Create contact
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: INSERT INTO contact (first_name, last_name, email) VALUES (#[payload.first_name],#[payload.last_name],#[payload.email])

sfdc:query.doc:name: Query Salesforce every 10 seconds
sfdc:query.query: dsql:SELECT Email,FirstName,LastModifiedDate,LastName FROM Contact WHERE LastModifiedDate > #[timestamp]
